attributes.action: Get all the politicians in the UK to get together and actually help with Brexit.
attributes.background:
I am sick and tired of the pantomime attitude towards politics that seems to happen whenever sides cannot agree on things. Brexit affects each and every one of us and I feel that we should be working together as such.

Please stop thinking about yourselves and start thinking about the UK people.

rejection.details:
We understand you would like politicians to take a different approach to Brexit, but we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition setting this out clearly.
